name: Elf Jetpack
description:
Santa drank a little too much eggnog and now it's up to you to collect all of the presents this Christmas Eve. But be warned, Santa's absence has caused panic in the workshop and once friendly toys are now wreaking havoc.

Twitter / Facebook / Discord / CatJailStudios@gmail.com

—X-Box Controls—

D-pad = Movement

A = Jump

L/R Trigger  = Jetpack

X = Hide in cart

Y = Teleport

Start  Button =  Pause

Select Button =  Full screen

—Keyboard—

Arrow keys = Movement

Spacebar = Jump

"S"  = Jetpack

"D" = Hide in cart

"E" = Teleport

"Esc" =  Pause

"Enter" =  Full-screen

—Team—

Kev — Programmer and Game Designer

Coryn — Artist (Twitter)(Twitch)
